name: SCR-Sibelco NV
goal: Sibelco is een "material solutions company" met wereldwijde activiteiten (waaronder hoofdzakelijk ontginning van mineralen en de veredeling en verkoop ervan).
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Competition, Energy, Environment, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Transport
